title: A proof of the Mond conjecture for wave fronts
authors: C. Mu\~noz-Cabello, J.J. Nu\~no-Ballesteros, R. Oset Sinha
abstract:
We prove the Mond conjecture for wave fronts which states that the number of
parameters of a frontal versal unfolding is less than or equal to the number of
spheres in the image of a stable frontal deformation with equality if the wave
front is weighted homogeneous. We give two different proofs. The first one
depends on the fact that wave fronts are related to discriminants of map germs
and we then use the analogous result proved by Damon and Mond in this context.
The second one is based on ideas by Fern\'andez de Bobadilla,
Nu\~no-Ballesteros and Pe\~nafort Sanchis and by Nu\~no-Ballesteros and
Fern\'andez-Hern\'andez. The advantage of the second approach is that most
results are valid for any frontal, not only wave fronts, and thus give
important tools which may be useful to prove the conjecture for frontals in
general.
